flawed_nl_solution:
Pedro has 100 squares - 60 squares = <<100-60=40>>40 more squares than Jesus.
Pedro has 100 squares - 75 squares = <<100-75=25>>25 more squares than Linden.
Combined Pedro has 40 squares + 25 squares = <<40+25=56>>56 squares more than both Jesus and Linden.
#### 56

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 65, not 56. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
